description: A tenant missed the rent deadline, the RentWise Assistant checks the payment history and lease, calculates the late fee, and sends a rent reminder with the added charge.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports using the provided tools.
Hi, I just realized I missed the rent for my unit 101 (property ID 12345). Can you tell me if I owe a late fee and send me a notice?
Let me check your payment record and the lease terms for late fees.
Late fee clause: If rent is not received by the due date, a $50 late fee will be applied to the outstanding balance.

According to the payment history, your $1,200 rent for November 1st is still unpaid. The lease specifies a $50 late fee for missed payments. I will send a reminder with the total amount of $1,250 due.
Reminder sent to tenant987@example.com: $1,250 due (rent + $50 late fee) for period ending 2025-11-01.

✅ I've sent a rent reminder to your email (tenant987@example.com) with the total amount of **$1,250** (including the $50 late fee). Please make the payment at your earliest convenience to avoid further penalties. Let me know if you need anything else, such as setting up a payment plan or a receipt.
